initial_state: The user is in the markdown editor and wants to format text as a code block.
steps: Select the text that needs to be formatted as a code block.
Click the 'Code block formatting' button on the toolbar or press CTRL + SHIFT + j.
Optionally, add custom tags for syntax highlighting and line numbers.
expected_state: The selected text appears as a code block in the preview area, with optional syntax highlighting and line numbers.
